MainItem.Text: accordance with Royal Warrant of 19th Nov., 1919, the designations of the undermentioned gradings of Military Accountant Officers are revised as under from 19th Nov;, 1919:— ___ ___ Group Accountants become temp. Accountant Officers, Class 3. j Accountant Officers, Grades, 1, 2 and 3, become temp. Accountant Officers, Classes 4, 5 and 6, respectively
